class_notes: This course is eligible to be counted towards the requirements for the J.D. concentration in Civil Litigation and Dispute Resolution.
course_description: Advanced Pretrial Litigation is for students who have taken Civil Procedure and Federal Courts.  We will cover topics that an attorney is likely to encounter in the practice of complex civil litigation.
sections: Class Nbr: 2655, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 5-8p, Instructor: Brackett/Fox, Status: Open
